description: Cáliz Bio is an innovative Argentine startup focused on leveraging native plants and upcycling agricultural by-products to develop sustainable nutraceuticals and food products. Founded in 2021, the company aims to enhance food sustainability by improving plant genetics for better resource efficiency. Collaborating with various stakeholders, including universities and investment groups, Cáliz Bio is committed to exploring the untapped potential of Argentina's diverse flora while promoting environmental stewardship and community well-being.
name: Cáliz Bio
